title: Shade's Lady
description: New York Times bestselling author Joanna Wylde returns to the world of the Reapers Motorcycle Club…  Looking back, none of this would’ve happened if I hadn’t dropped my phone in the toilet. I mean, I could’ve walked away from him if I’d had it with me. Or maybe not. Maybe it was all over the first time he saw me, and he would’ve found another way. Probably—if there’s one thing I’ve learned, it’s that Shade always gets what he wants, and apparently he wanted me. Right from the first.
author: Joanna Wylde
